name: Gamectober 2020
description:
This game is a compilation of games made during the #Gamectober2020.

Controls for each game

Escape : return to menu

Game numberControls1 - PolygonesQ/Left arrow : Move left
D/Right arrow : Move right
Space : Jump
Mouse scrollwheel : change polygons2 - JumeauxZ/Up arrow : Move up
Q/Left arrow : Move left
S/Down arrow : Move down
D/Right arrow : Move right3 - CheckpointUp arrow : place people up
Left arrow : place people left Right arrow : place people right
4 - Darwin
Z/Up arrow : Move up
Q/Left arrow : Move left
S/Down arrow : Move down
D/Right arrow : Move right5 - Plusieurs niveaux de difficultéClick on difficulty levels on left to change the power of enemies spawning.6 - ArchéologieDrag and drop the missing elements in right screen upon the sarcophagus at right.
